fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Deem a player as infectious.
- Spread gossip that a player is infectious.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only have 2 players deemed as infectious.
- The gossip about the two act separate.
- When someone visits you, or you visit them (unless you're deeming them infectious), you will inform them about all currently "infectious" players. They will not be notified.
- This spreads like a Plaguebearer's plague, anyone who knows about gossip who visits or gets visited will spread it.
- If someone who has heard gossip about someone tries to visit the player, their ability will fail.
- If someone who has heard gossip gets visited by an "infectious" player, they will run from their house, and the "infectious" player's ability will fail.
- Biohazard players cannot be fooled by gossip. However, they can be deemed as "infectious".
- To prevent an endless loop, "infectious" players cannot spread gossip about themselves. Yes, this means you cannot mark yourself as "infectious".
- Plague immune.
